title: TeraLab Organizes Special Session ''HPCAIG - High Performance Computing for AI-driven Genomics'' @ CIBB2025
description: We are proud to announce that our Laboratory has organized the special session 'HPCAIG - High Performance Computing for AI-driven Genomics' for CIBB2025, the 20th International Conference on Computational Intelligence Methods for Bioinformatics and Biostatistics. This specialized session, taking place September 10-12, 2025 at Politecnico di Milano, will focus on the intersection of high-performance computing and artificial intelligence applications in genomics research.
